tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to undefined behavior due to missing bounds checks in the safe Rust interface. This flaw allows out-of-bounds memory access, potentially leading to memory corruption, crashes, or other unpredictable behavior.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and using template::UriTemplateStr.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `stringzilla` library to the patch version.
